channel.title: Mangesh's Blog
channel.description: A blog about software development, machine learning, and technology

item.title: SEO In Depth: How Google Search Index Works & How To Optimize Your Site
item.description: A comprehensive guide to SEO, covering Google Search Index, technical, on-page, and off-page optimization for modern websites.

item.title: What is GLM-4.5? The AI Model That's Changing Everything
item.description: A deep dive into GLM-4.5, the revolutionary AI model that unifies reasoning, coding, and agentic capabilities. Learn how this 355-billion parameter model is reshaping AI development.

item.title: Is Cloudflare’s Free Plan Worth It? A Deep Dive into Its Best Features
item.description: Explore the analytics, security, and performance tools included in Cloudflare’s free plan, with practical tips and screenshots.

item.title: How to Connect Your Domain to Cloudflare in 15 Minutes: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: A quick, actionable tutorial for setting up Cloudflare on your website, with annotated screenshots.

item.title: Track Your Code Analytics with WakaTime
item.description: Learn how to set up and use WakaTime to automatically track your coding time and productivity across different editors and projects.

item.title: Hot Reload Implementation for Django Staging Environment
item.description: Learn how to implement hot reloading for Django applications in a staging environment with Docker Compose and Gunicorn for improved development experience.

item.title: How to implement soft delete in Django
item.description: Learn how to implement soft delete functionality in Django using custom managers and model mixins.

item.title: Procedural Generation: Creating Infinite Worlds
item.description: Deep dive into procedural generation technology and its applications in creating vast game worlds.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my blog! Here I'll share my projects, thoughts on technology, and more.
